SELECT e.article_abstract,e.article_url,e.status_article,e.idt_article,e.special_column_id,e.article_title,e.user_id,e.create_time,e.update_time,n.idt_special_column "specialColumn.idtSpecialColumn",n.column_name "specialColumn.columnName",n.column_type "specialColumn.columnType" FROM t_article e LEFT JOIN t_special_column n ON e.special_column_id = n.idt_special_column WHERE e.article_title LIKE '%${articleTitle}%'
